name: uu_appg01_core

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run dist-node && npm run dist-browser
scripts.doc: jsdoc -t node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -c tools/jsdoc.config.json -d doc/ -r --readme README.md src/
scripts.package: npm run dist && npm run test && npm run doc
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
